events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application online, specifying it is for medical expenses.
The application was reviewed by the system and categorised under Personal Loan based on keywords in the purpose section.
Loan officer Sarah Thompson was assigned to handle this case given her experience with medical-related personal loans.
The initial review indicated that the applicantâ€™s income and credit history meet the preliminary criteria.
Additional documents requested include the medical bills and proof of income for verification purposes.
Applicant submitted all requested documents, including detailed medical expense receipts and their latest pay stubs.
Credit check completed and showed a healthy credit score with no recent delinquencies or defaults.
The risk assessment results are favorable with low risk identified for lending the requested amount.
A loan offer with a competitive interest rate and flexible repayment terms was presented to the applicant.
Applicant provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the offer and indicating willingness to proceed.
The loan was officially approved following thorough verification of submitted documents and assessment results.
Loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant's bank account to cover their medical expenses.
Follow-up call was conducted to confirm the receipt of funds and ensure the applicant understood repayment schedule.
The loan application was closed successfully after all steps were completed and the applicant was satisfied.
